Individuals CAI deficit neuromuscular control alter gait pattern . Ankle destabilization shoe use clinically may improve neuromuscular control increase low extremity muscle activation , may improve gait pattern . The investigator ' purpose determine whether 4-week rehabilitation program include ankle destabilization shoe ( experimental ) beneficial effect self-reported function ankle gait kinematics compare traditional rehabilitation without destabilization shoe ( control ) CAI patient . In addition , investigator compare ankle strength balance CAI patient healthy individual history ankle injury prior 4-week rehabilitation . The investigator hypothesize experimental group great improvement self-reported function frontal sagittal plane kinematics walk compare control group . In addition , investigator hypothesize patient CAI decrease ankle strength balance compare healthy individual . The design single-blinded randomized control trial . Forty CAI patient complete baseline self-reported function questionnaire walk gait trial randomize control experimental group . Both group complete 4-weeks supervised rehabilitation without destabilization shoe repeat questionnaire walk trial .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Rehabilitation Incorporating Gait Training On Clinical Measures Associated With Chronic Ankle Instability
